✉️ Contact

Ask - Translate AI on any website.

Ask or translate anything with just one click using ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini. Automatically protects tokens and sensitive data.

Install Chrome Extension 💡 Useful Insights

Step 1: Open the extension settings and choose your preferred AI.

You can choose from three AI models: ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini.

Step 2: Highlight the text — two buttons 'Ask AI' and 'Trans' will appear. Choose based on your need.

Both buttons will copy the selected text, mask sensitive info like tokens or links, and paste it into the AI chat box.

Step 3: Automatically translate the text using a preset prompt

You can customize the translation tone in the extension's settings.

🧩 How It Works

Quickly understand how QuickAsk AI works in just 3 steps.

Switch tabs seamlessly while keeping your data secure when interacting with AI.

🌍 Supports 26+ Languages

Translate naturally with context awareness.

🧠 Multiple AI Models

Choose ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini...

🛡️ Token Protection

Automatically masks tokens, emails, URLs...

🧩 Seamless Interface

Highlight → Ask → Get results right in your current tab.

🗂️ Custom Prompts

Adjust tone, style, length as needed...

📌 Whitelist / Blacklist

Control where the extension is active.

🎯 Who Is It For?

QuickAsk AI is designed for those who value clarity, efficiency, and seamless interaction with AI — wherever they are.

  • 🌐 Language learners needing accurate translations
  • 👨‍💻 Developers reading documentation in foreign languages
  • 💼 Professionals communicating with international clients
  • 📣 Marketers needing to rewrite or summarize content
  • 🎓 Students and researchers using multilingual sources
  • 🧠 Anyone who needs quick AI assistance without interrupting their workflow
